84947.summary: Some customers in the River West Park area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84947.title: Nov 26 - Winnipeg (River West Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

84949.summary: Some customers in the Red River area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84949.title: Nov 26 - Thunder Bay (Red River) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
